products.title: Words, Summer - Roller Blind
products.description: The fun, alphabet sprinkled words summer is a bold, funky choice for your home, and you'll find yourself absentmindedly creating words from nowhere. The bright lime and vivid yellow are tempered by the subtle dove grey, and placed on an off-white background fabric that allows light to filter through at will. Use the summer in a family dining room to add fun and games to dinnertime, or hang in a child's bedroom to get them learning the alphabet without even thinking about it.

products.title: Seasons Summer Roller Blind
products.description: Bright coloured leaves adorn this white roller blind in a vibrant and vivid pattern. Theres a mix of warm red, burnt orange, sky blue and sunshine yellow that gives this blind its energetic aspect. The leaves seem to swirl and twirl across this blind as if blown by the wind bright coloured leaves adorn this white roller blind in a vibrant and vivid pattern.

products.title: Hygge Birds Summer Berry Roller Blind
products.description: Theres brightness and warmth in every thread of this gorgeous, contemporary and frankly charming hygge birds summer berry roller blind. The dazzling colours are calmed and muted by the soft, creamy fabric, so vibrant it may be but the overall effect is quite neutral. Thats grea theres brightness and warmth in every thread of this gorgeous, contemporary and frankly charming hygge birds summer berry roller blind.

products.title: Summer Trail, Essential - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the relaxed pace of life that comes hand in hand with country living, which is probably why summer trail essential caught the eye the moment we saw it. The florals are elegant and enjoyable - two things that we all hope for from their new look interiors. If you want to be able to celebrate the way in which the light enters the living room, you need a roller blind that brings everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Tranquil, Summer - Roller Blind
products.description: Delicate water-paint florals set a beautifully peaceful scene on the tranquil summer, with pretty wildflowers in rich purples, deep pinks, and pale lilacs. The cream, light-filtering backdrop has a near translucent feel, perfect for watching the light trickle through on a sunny day. The summer will add delicacy and charm to a country kitchen, where it can sit elegantly amongst light cream walls and units, accented by pinks and purples to bring out the gorgeous hues in this attractive blind.

products.title: Daphne, Summerbright - Roller Blind
products.description: The modern, trendy summerbright from the daphne range combines navy blue with a cool, mustard yellow on a light, off-white background to form a contemporary design with a classic twist that the whole family will love. Work in style with the summerbright taking centre stage in your home office, countered by matching soft furnishings and modern, functional furniture. Or step away from conventional kitchen colour schemes by making this the starting point for your dcor style in the heart of the home.

products.title: Summer Trail, Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: Summer trail pastel combines contemporary colours with country chic to create a fabric that you'll instantly fall in love with. The beauty lies in the simplicity with which the intricate florals adorn the finely woven canvas. Just what you need to lose yourself in the moment. When you want to create a theme that brings your space to life, it's all about celebrating authenticity. Use natural textures like hessian, slate, and bare wood to create a lived in space that instantly welcomes you to put your feet up and take it easy.

products.title: Summer Trail, Blossom - Roller Blind
products.description: Summer trail blossom is the finishing touch to one of their most popular ranges, and the selection of country chic colours are the reason we consider it one of their jewels in the crown. There are so many exciting creative avenues that open up to you that it'll be hard to know which one to explore first. Crisp blues and light mint greens will work in perfect harmony with blossom to create a look that will live long in the memory.

products.title: Kiribati Blackout Summer Roller Blind
products.description: With bright pops of colour in striking watercolour style, kiribati blackout summer would make a beautiful statement in your home. With plenty of modern charm and vibrant colours, this roller blind from their voyage collection will bring joy and personality to any space. To real with bright pops of colour in striking watercolour style, kiribati blackout summer would make a beautiful statement in your home.

products.title: Summer Trail (Blackout), Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: The floral stylings of summer trail blackout pastel allow you to lose yourself in the sounds and sites of spring no matter what time of year it is. Just what you need when you want to create that relaxing vibe you never want to leave. Matching to pastel is all about working in some lively colours like a mint green or a sunrise yellow. Use them on your minor surfaces such as lampshades and scatter cushions, and they'll work in perfect harmony with your light wooden floor and rich creamy walls.

products.title: Summer Trail (Blackout), Blossom - Roller Blind
products.description: Blossom is one of the latest additions to their summer trail blackout range, and it adds that sought after country aesthetic to any contemporary home. The intricacy of the florals allows you to lose yourself in the moment, whilst the subtle display of colour is perfect when you want to take your decor in multiple different directions. Think about ways to introduce coppers and slate greys into your space and you'll be rewarded with a contemporary look that has an ample helping of modern chic.

products.title: Ilinizas Blackout Summer Roller Blind
products.description: Simply divine, ilinizas summer is reminiscent of a hazy, carefree summers day. A beautiful watercolour flower meadow with vibrant pinks, inky blues and lemon effortlessly harmonise to create this timeless floral beauty. Its a joyful and delicate design which is guaranteed simply divine, ilinizas summer is reminiscent of a hazy, carefree summers day.
